overview.en: BBAYCOIN(BBC)是BBAY交易所的平台币，同时也是BBAYWORLD区块链游戏平台的支付方式。BBC将进一步在电子商务、社交媒体、视频直播、广告营销、慈善公益等领域进行大规模应用试验。未来我们将创建BBAY区块链，并迁移代币到BBAYCHAIN上。
overview.zh: BBAYCOIN (BBC) is the platform currency of the BBAY exchange, and is also the payment method of the BBAYWORLD blockchain game platform. The BBC will further conduct large-scale application trials in the fields of e-commerce, social media, live video, advertising and marketing, and charity. In the future we will create a BBAY blockchain and migrate tokens to BBAYCHAIN.
